1356830.name: Stone it!
1356830.description:
Stone it! - A logic game in which you have to roll a block to the goal. Solve puzzles with buttons, clear the road with lasers and lower bridges - do everything to reach the goal. Beautiful locations add variety to levels, and winding paths make passing interesting and train logical thinking.

And most importantly, remember - there is always a solution, you just need to find it! Good luck!
1356830.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语
